cause.description:
Is to give an advice or a propostion , in which does affect soonly on others.
Show examples or give specific descriptions.
Show special video clips for so to stop speeding cars.
1. The speed limit is 120km
2. The more speed you gain , the more pain you will maintain
3. Speeding affects the surrounding atmosphere.
cause.mission: dis-courage speeding as best as we can!
cause.name: Speeding Up Is Bad!!!
